content: रजस्वल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [रजस्-वलच्] {@--1@} Dusty, covered with dust; <ls>R. 11. 60</ls>; <ls>Śi. 17. 61</ls>; (where it also means ‘being in menses,’). {@--2@} Full of passion (रजस्) or emotion; <ls>Ms. 6. 77.</ls> --लः A buffalo. --ला {@--1@} A woman during the menses; रजस्वलाः परिमलिनांबरश्रियः <ls>Śi. 17. 61</ls>; <ls>Y. 3. 229</ls>; <ls>R. 11. 60.</ls> {@--2@} A marriageable girl.
